content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":16091,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの大統領さんのファンクラブって感じだしー……","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like that president's fan club..."},
{"lineNumber":16092,"originalJapaneseLine":"　は！　パットンさんならお兄さんだからセーフ？","translatedEnglishLine":"Ha! If it's Patton-san, he's your big brother, so it's safe?"},
{"lineNumber":16093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばっ……だめだめ！","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no... absolutely not!"},
{"lineNumber":16094,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハンティさんと取り合いさせる気！？","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you trying to make me compete with Hanti-san!?"},
{"lineNumber":16095,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーっ！　あれってそうなの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ehh! Is that really the case!?"},
{"lineNumber":16096,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………まったくもう。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Good grief."},
{"lineNumber":16097,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界は大変だっていうのに","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though the world is in such turmoil."},
{"lineNumber":16098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいんじゃないの、多少緩んでも。","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't it okay to loosen up a little?"},
{"lineNumber":16099,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悲壮な顔してるのも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Making such a tragic face,"},
{"lineNumber":16100,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物の思うツボみたいで面白くないし","translatedEnglishLine":"just plays into the monsters' hands. It's not interesting."},
{"lineNumber":16101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「志津香……なんだか、丸くなった？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka... have you softened somehow?"},
{"lineNumber":16102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうかしら」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if I have."},
{"lineNumber":16103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……そうね。","translatedEnglishLine":"But... yes."},
{"lineNumber":16104,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういうのも……負けない、ってことよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"That also means... not giving in, right?"},
{"lineNumber":16105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずっと……は、難しいかも知れないけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"To do so... forever might be difficult, though."},
{"lineNumber":16106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こうして四人でいる時は……","translatedEnglishLine":"When the four of us are together like this..."},
{"lineNumber":16107,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな風なままが、いいかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe it's best to stay just like this..."},
{"lineNumber":16108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………そうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Yes."},
{"lineNumber":16109,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランの腕がゆるく湯船をかき混ぜて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ran’s arm gently stirred the water in the bathtub,"},
{"lineNumber":16110,"originalJapaneseLine":"小さく作られた波が進んでいって、やがて消えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Small waves formed and traveled forward, then eventually disappeared."},
{"lineNumber":16111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こちらの部隊に編入か。よろしく頼む」","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re being assigned to this unit. I’m counting on you."},
{"lineNumber":16112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さーて、何か面白いものは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, let's see if there's anything interesting..."},
{"lineNumber":16113,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――えい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"—Ei!"},
{"lineNumber":16114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――応！」","translatedEnglishLine":"—O!"},{"lineNumber":16115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm...?"},{"lineNumber":16116,"originalJapaneseLine":"見ると、傭兵の一団が、Mランドの一角で","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking over, a group of mercenaries were in a corner of M Land"},
{"lineNumber":16117,"originalJapaneseLine":"訓練を行っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"conducting training."},
{"lineNumber":16118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ……皆さん、頑張ってますねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wow... everyone’s really giving it their all."},
{"lineNumber":16119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遊園地でむさ苦しい連中が武器を振ってる図は","translatedEnglishLine":"The sight of these scruffy guys brandishing weapons at an amusement park"},
{"lineNumber":16120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なかなかシュールだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"is rather surreal..."},
{"lineNumber":16121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………お。セシル発見！　おーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Oh. Cecil found! Hey!"},
{"lineNumber":16122,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む。総統か。視察お疲れ様だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh. The Supreme Leader. Thanks for the inspection."},
{"lineNumber":16123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「適当に見て回ってるだけだがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm just casually looking around."},
{"lineNumber":16124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これ、お前の部隊か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is this your unit?"},
{"lineNumber":16125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ。紅の鉄槌……私が元々率いていた傭兵団だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah. The Red Hammer... the mercenary group I originally led."},
{"lineNumber":16126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自由都市連合の中核だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"They're the core of the Free Cities Alliance."},
{"lineNumber":16127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「傭兵団って割にはかなり多いな……","translatedEnglishLine":"For a mercenary band, that's quite a large number..."},
{"lineNumber":16128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一万近いのじゃないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn’t it close to ten thousand?"},
{"lineNumber":16129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなところか。","translatedEnglishLine":"About that."},
{"lineNumber":16130,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出入りも多いんだがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Though they have a high turnover rate."},
{"lineNumber":16131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すごいですね……","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s amazing..."},
{"lineNumber":16132,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな沢山の人、管理するなんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Managing so many people..."},
{"lineNumber":16133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「キチッと訓練してるなんて軍隊みたいだな……","translatedEnglishLine":"Training them properly, it’s almost like a real army..."},
{"lineNumber":16134,"originalJapaneseLine":"　傭兵なんて普通、もっとだらしないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mercenaries are usually more sloppy."},
{"lineNumber":16135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは簡単に死ぬ。","translatedEnglishLine":"They would die easily that way."},
{"lineNumber":16136,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うちの連中には、それを教えてある」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s something I’ve taught my people."},
{"lineNumber":16137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふぅむ……セシルはけっこう、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmmm... Cecil is quite good at"},
{"lineNumber":16138,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大集団を率いるのがうまいのか……ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"leading a large group, huh...?"},
{"lineNumber":16139,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、あれ……団長の所にいる奴……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, that guy by the leader..."},
{"lineNumber":16140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……魔人狩りのランス総統だ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... that's Supreme Leader Rance, the demon hunter..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの大統領さんのファンクラブって感じだしー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like that president's fan club...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は！　パットンさんならお兄さんだからセーフ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha! If it's Patton-san, he's your big brother, so it's safe?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばっ……だめだめ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no... absolutely not!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハンティさんと取り合いさせる気！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you trying to make me compete with Hanti-san!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっ！　あれってそうなの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ehh! Is that really the case!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………まったくもう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Good grief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界は大変だっていうのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though the world is in such turmoil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいんじゃないの、多少緩んでも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it okay to loosen up a little?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悲壮な顔してるのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Making such a tragic face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の思うツボみたいで面白くないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just plays into the monsters' hands. It's not interesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「志津香……なんだか、丸くなった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka... have you softened somehow?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if I have.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも……そうね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうのも……負けない、ってことよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That also means... not giving in, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ずっと……は、難しいかも知れないけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To do so... forever might be difficult, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こうして四人でいる時は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the four of us are together like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな風なままが、いいかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe it's best to stay just like this...
...Yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランの腕がゆるく湯船をかき混ぜて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ran’s arm gently stirred the water in the bathtub,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さく作られた波が進んでいって、やがて消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Small waves formed and traveled forward, then eventually disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらの部隊に編入か。よろしく頼む」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re being assigned to this unit. I’m counting on you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、何か面白いものは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, let's see if there's anything interesting...
—Ei!
Hmm...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見ると、傭兵の一団が、Mランドの一角で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking over, a group of mercenaries were in a corner of M Land

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 訓練を行っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: conducting training.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ……皆さん、頑張ってますねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow... everyone’s really giving it their all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遊園地でむさ苦しい連中が武器を振ってる図は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sight of these scruffy guys brandishing weapons at an amusement park

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなかシュールだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is rather surreal...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………お。セシル発見！　おーい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Oh. Cecil found! Hey!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む。総統か。視察お疲れ様だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh. The Supreme Leader. Thanks for the inspection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「適当に見て回ってるだけだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm just casually looking around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ、お前の部隊か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this your unit?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。紅の鉄槌……私が元々率いていた傭兵団だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah. The Red Hammer... the mercenary group I originally led.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合の中核だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're the core of the Free Cities Alliance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「傭兵団って割にはかなり多いな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a mercenary band, that's quite a large number...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一万近いのじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn’t it close to ten thousand?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなところか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出入りも多いんだがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though they have a high turnover rate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごいですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな沢山の人、管理するなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Managing so many people...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キチッと訓練してるなんて軍隊みたいだな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Training them properly, it’s almost like a real army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傭兵なんて普通、もっとだらしないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mercenaries are usually more sloppy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは簡単に死ぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They would die easily that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うちの連中には、それを教えてある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s something I’ve taught my people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅむ……セシルはけっこう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmmm... Cecil is quite good at

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大集団を率いるのがうまいのか……ん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leading a large group, huh...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、あれ……団長の所にいる奴……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, that guy by the leader...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……魔人狩りのランス総統だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... that's Supreme Leader Rance, the demon hunter...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出入りも多いんだがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though they have a high turnover rate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごいですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな沢山の人、管理するなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Managing so many people...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キチッと訓練してるなんて軍隊みたいだな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Training them properly, it’s almost like a real army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傭兵なんて普通、もっとだらしないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mercenaries are usually more sloppy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは簡単に死ぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They would die easily that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うちの連中には、それを教えてある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s something I’ve taught my people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅむ……セシルはけっこう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmmm... Cecil is quite good at

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大集団を率いるのがうまいのか……ん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leading a large group, huh...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、あれ……団長の所にいる奴……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, that guy by the leader...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……魔人狩りのランス総統だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... that's Supreme Leader Rance, the demon hunter...
